name: Movement Demo
description:
• Move with arrow keys
  • Jump with 'z' or arrow up
  • Attack with 'x'
  • 'Escape' quits

This was made during the Learn a Tool or Technique Jam. I was learning pixel art character design and animation, both things I haven't really done before making this. I used Unity to give the character a playable space to run around in. The web player version wasn't working so you'll have to download the .exe to try it out.

Please ★ View submission for Learn a Tool or Technique Jam for more information.
